created_time: September 10, 2022, 10:37:32 AMLast edit: September 21, 2022, 05:48:08 PM by zasad@
content: Luna 1.0 Terra Luna Classic (LUNC)https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/terra-luna-classicTerraClassicUSD (USTC)https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/terraclassicusdhttps://twitter.com/terra_moneyProposal for the 1.2% Tax Parameter Changehttps://classic-agora.terra.money/t/proposal-for-the-1-2-tax-parameter-change/46319As per the new 1.2% Tax Parameter Change proposal, taxes will be charged and burned for on-chain activities, including transfers of LUNC and USTC between wallets and smart contracts.The proposal essentially seeks to carry out a 1.2% token burn tax on all transactions in a bid to transform LUNC into a deflationary asset.If passed by Terraform Labs (TFL), the 1.2% tax burn will be activated by September 20.https://cryptopotato.com/terra-luna-classic-lunc-soars-100-weekly-as-kucoin-gate-io-extend-tax-burn-support/$LUNC: KuCoin Supports ‘1.2% Tax Burn Proposal of the Terra Classic (LUNC) Community’https://www.cryptoglobe.com/latest/2022/09/lunc-kucoin-supports-1-2-tax-burn-proposal-of-the-terra-classic-lunc-community/https://twitter.com/LunaBurnTracker/status/1528283398162239490This is the Luna Burn Address. Be aware of fakes. terra1sk06e3dyexuq4shw77y3dsv480xv42mq73anxuLunc Burnerhttps://terrarity.io/analytics/lunc-burnerLUNCBURN COMMUNITYhttps://twitter.com/KingAnu53015481/status/1568517885613547521https://luncpenguins.com/Terra Luna Classic tax burn gains Binance, Huobi, and BTCEX supportCrypto exchanges Binance, Huobi, and BTCEX unite to support Terra Luna Classic burn.https://www.gfinityesports.com/cryptocurrency/terra-luna-classic-tax-burn-binance-huobi-btcex-support/Luna 2.0 Terra (LUNA)https://twitter.com/terra_armyEXCLUSIVE: Inside Crypto’s Largest Collapse with Terra Founder Do Kwon | Coinage Episode 0 Part Ihttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5g9ycHS0xtUTerra founder Do Kwon discusses LUNA 2.0 and the prospect of a Terra mole | Coinage Episode 0 Part 2https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YF_MZvD5ao4How to Claim Your LUNA Airdrophttps://medium.com/terra-money/how-to-claim-your-luna-airdrop-b383d8e0900f______If you want to invest here, look into this.I do not recommend investment, but it was interesting for me to study up-to-date information___LOL  LUNC DAO- Idiothttps://twitter.com/LUNCDAO/status/1567969659776864256"If CZ doesn't put the 1.2% tax on buys/sells as asked by the $LUNC community, my gov proposal is as follows:1. Blacklist the Binance wallet to stop anyone sending money there2. If anyone e.g. a VC tries to send money to Binance then automatically reroute it to the burn wallet"

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: https://www.chosun.com/national/court_law/2022/09/14/2YBHH4ZQKFCKBJJPENIHHQYOOQ/https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-09-14/south-korea-seeks-the-arrest-of-terraform-labs-founder-do-kwonTerra Co-Founder Do Kwon Faces Arrest Warrant in South Korea"Court in Seoul issued warrant for Do Kwon and five othersAllegations include violations of nation’s capital markets lawA court in South Korea issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon, the founder of the Terraform Labs cryptocurrency ecosystem, whose implosion earlier this year sparked a global crypto rout.The court in Seoul issued a warrant for Do Kwon and five others on allegations that include violations of the nation’s capital markets law, according to a text message from the prosecutor’s office. "

comments.author: CryptoBuds
comments.body: Quote from: zasad@ on September 14, 2022, 12:58:06 PMhttps://www.chosun.com/national/court_law/2022/09/14/2YBHH4ZQKFCKBJJPENIHHQYOOQ/https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-09-14/south-korea-seeks-the-arrest-of-terraform-labs-founder-do-kwonTerra Co-Founder Do Kwon Faces Arrest Warrant in South Korea"Court in Seoul issued warrant for Do Kwon and five othersAllegations include violations of nation’s capital markets lawA court in South Korea issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon, the founder of the Terraform Labs cryptocurrency ecosystem, whose implosion earlier this year sparked a global crypto rout.The court in Seoul issued a warrant for Do Kwon and five others on allegations that include violations of the nation’s capital markets law, according to a text message from the prosecutor’s office. "They should have done this a long time ago, but it's not too late now. I wonder, now that Dokwon is hiding in singapore, how can he catch him? With this announcement, he will never be able to return to his hometown and moreover he and the people who used to work for Terra will no longer have the opportunity to participate in any future projects, which is a good thing for the crypto community. This news will be a big blow to luna and there will be panic and dumping, maybe this is the end for these 2 tokens.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoBuds on September 14, 2022, 01:38:18 PMThey should have done this a long time ago, but it's not too late now. Plenty persons will be excited for this new development, there were too many unresolved issues with their first project, they did not even wait a while for those issues to be sorted out and for people to forget about the thousands and millions that they lost before starting a new project. That's very inconsiderate, a show of greed, and a nonchalant behavior. The bitter lesson Luna thought some persons will forever champion and fuel disbelief against new projects, even the credible ones.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I’d keep far away from anything even remotely linked to LUNA & this group of people. Saddens me what happened with LUNA. So many people were screwed over, for that principal I will have nothing to do with LUNA 2.0

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoBuds on September 14, 2022, 01:38:18 PMThey should have done this a long time ago, but it's not too late now. I wonder, now that Dokwon is hiding in singapore, how can he catch him? With this announcement, he will never be able to return to his hometown and moreover he and the people who used to work for Terra will no longer have the opportunity to participate in any future projects, which is a good thing for the crypto community. This news will be a big blow to luna and there will be panic and dumping, maybe this is the end for these 2 tokens.Terra Classic does not need Do Kwon to move next. He decided to sacrify it to save UST but this decision failed. Later, he switched to a new Terra, and abandon the original, now is called as Terra Classic.Catching him or not, it is not bad news for Terra Classic community and investors. I see it as good news because in future, no more negative news for Terra Classic just because of Do Kwon. Having a dump after this arresting news but once and for all, for a brighter future.To have better future, Terra Classic must not be connected to Do Kwon.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/terra-founder-kwons-singapore-employment-permit-risk-%E2%80%94-straits-timesTerra founder Kwon’s Singapore employment permit at risk — Straits Times"Kwon has applied to renew his employment pass, which gives him the right to work in Singapore and which expires on Dec 7, according to the report. Kwon applied for an EntrePass — which is meant to allow eligible foreign entrepreneurs to start and operate businesses in Singapore — and was rejected, the ST said, citing Ministry of Manpower (MOM) records."
